to my knowledge 1 is completely impossible (you could BCC yourself each email with the compliance copy feature but then it's already been sent).

option 2: you *can* directly talk to the smtp server (via SMTP API) but only send transactional email that way, not marketing subscription type based email. in addition, you cannot really access email templates or anything, you basically have to build the email from scratch yourself (with any custom headers you like etc.) so no way to leverage the email editor etc. for these emails.
